informationRequested.dataType: Statistical analysis of candidate performance trends

purposeOfRequest: We are conducting a comprehensive review of assessment effectiveness and candidate outcomes as part of our continuous improvement process. This data will help us identify potential areas where our assessment methods could be enhanced to better serve candidate needs and maintain qualification standards.
detailedJustification:
Following feedback from stakeholders and preliminary internal analysis, we have identified some inconsistencies in candidate performance across different regions and demographic groups. We require detailed performance data to:

1. Investigate potential bias in assessment processes
2. Evaluate the effectiveness of different assessment delivery methods
3. Identify regional variations that may indicate training or support issues
4. Ensure our qualifications are accessible and fair to all candidate groups
5. Benchmark our performance against sector standards

This analysis is essential for maintaining the integrity and credibility of our qualifications and ensuring compliance with equality and diversity requirements.

dataProcessingDetails.lawfulBasis: Legitimate interest in maintaining assessment quality

confidentialityAssurances.accessRestrictions: Access limited to senior quality assurance team (5 individuals)
confidentialityAssurances.anonymisationCommitment: All individual candidate data will be anonymised
confidentialityAssurances.sharingLimitations: Data will not be shared with third parties
confidentialityAssurances.destructionDate: Data will be securely destroyed after 3 years
